pages.name: page2
pages.title: Part A2: Preliminary information (Authorization for Representative)-Privacy complaint form (federal institution)

elements.name: complainant_HaveYouSubmittedBefore_info
elements.html: We are asking this to ensure we have accurate contact information for individuals who submit complaints. Please note, we may update your contact information for any active complaints with our office, using the information you provide below.

elements.name: email
elements.title: Thank you for taking our survey. Your survey is almost complete, please enter your email address in the box below if you wish to participate in our drawing, then press the 'Submit' button.
